snippet: In Chicago, a city bludgeoned by gang wars, many students are making the choice not to go to school based on a justified fear of violence.
lead_paragraph: In Chicago, a city bludgeoned by gang wars, many students are making the choice not to go to school based on a justified fear of violence.

headline.main: A Hard Road From the Wrong Side of an American City
headline.print_headline: A Hard Road From the Wrong Side of an American City
